page.title: 17WORM-FARMING,1985
page.content: This worm farming is the lastest thing that has started in farming. It began in the United States of a America.These worms are quite amazing, because they will eat almost anything. They breed with themselves and not with each other. The idea of worm farming is to help put goodnees into the manure. Most farmers keep them in for a while,but now people are building pits for them outside.This makes them breed more as well. Worm farming wasn't heard of before long ago,but they ar'nt the everyday worms.
